name: Animated Stove
book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Belch Fire (Recharge 4\u20136): The stove belches fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10+1d4 + 8 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
